sentences.cn: 计算机化的薪资管理系统

sentences.en: All told there were 104 people on the payroll.
Are you trying to get me off your payroll?
Discovering a line in front of the payroll's clerk's window one day, Frankie companionably joined it.
sentences.cn: 一天, 弗兰基发现发工资的窗口前面有人排着队,它也跟着人们排队.
唐纳德制作了一份工资表.

sentences.en: Every business incurs a number of accrued liabilities relating to its payroll.
sentences.cn: 每个企业都会发生一些与工资有关的应计负债.

sentences.en: He's no longer on their payroll.
I can't wait to get my payroll check.
sentences.cn: 我真等不及拿到我的工资单了.

sentences.en: I hear she is off the payroll.
In charge of and make sure Payroll calculation and distribution , IIT preparation.
sentences.cn: 负责并确保员工工资的正确计算和支付 、 税金的正确计算和缴纳.

sentences.en: Shortly before noon Edwina instructed Tottenhoe to advise the payroll department.
sentences.cn: 快到中午时候,埃德温娜吩咐托顿霍去通知工资科.
年度工资总支出为8,800万美元

sentences.en: The general manager is trying to meet the payroll.
sentences.cn: 总经理在设法筹措款项支付工资.

sentences.en: They had 87,000 employees on the payroll.
We have 500 people on the payroll .
When Bull and his men rob the payroll, Gene chases them down.
sentences.cn: 当公牛和他手下抢夺工资后, 基尔追踪他们.

trans.tran_cn: 工资名单，工资总支出，工薪总额
trans.tran_en: The people on the payroll of a company or an organization are the people who work for it and are paid by it
